smg.text: Humid. Cloudy. Mist. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 5 east to southeasterly winds with gusts.
Humid. Cloudy. Mist. Occasional showers. Possible thunderstorms later. Force 3 to 4 southerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
